abstract: Growing number of ways to bypass charges for text messages using Internet connections could take a big bite out of profits they generate for wireless carriers; more than two trillion text messages are sent annually in the United States, generating more than $20 billion in revenue for wireless industry.
snippet: New ways to bypass charges for text messages could take a big bite out of wireless carriers’ profits.
lead_paragraph: New ways to bypass charges for text messages could take a big bite out of wireless carriers’ profits.

headline.main: Free Texts Pose Threat to Carriers
headline.print_headline: Free Texts Pose Threat To Carriers
headline.seo: Free Texting Apps Are Threat to Wireless Carriers
